attributes.action: Reduction in council tax until country stabilises.
attributes.additional_details: Local council tax is ever increasing and less and less is being done by councils . I will be forced to sell my house as council tax amount is imbalanced on my income .
attributes.background: Local authorities should not be increasing council tax during this time of health and financial instability. A reduction from the already exorbitant rate  should be implemented into the government scheme to support the uk in these times.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
